channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- Huawei Mate10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- Huawei Mate10

item.title: CVE-2019-5214|2024-08-04T19:47:56.745Z -- huawei -- huawei%20mate10
item.description: There is a use after free vulnerability on certain driver component in Huawei Mate10 smartphones versions earlier than ALP-AL00B 9.0.0.167(C00E85R2P20T8). An attacker tricks the user into installing a malicious application, which make the software to reference memory after it has been freed. Successful exploit could cause a denial of service condition.
